note: Geo D. Barnard & Co. St. Louis.
p: In the matter of the application of Maria L. Peterson for writ of Habeas Corpus.

This cause coming on for hearing in open Court on this 13th day of September 1889 Gowin & Liner appearing for the petitioner and George J. Moody appearing for the respondents. The court having heard the evidence of the parties and the arguments of counsel and being fully advised in the precurs it is by the court ordered adjudged and decreed that the said petition be denied with costs and the said children and be relinquished to the respondents Mrs. L.
